Package oh_hecc.game_parts.passage

Class AbstractPassage

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.game_parts.passage.AbstractPassage
All Implemented Interfaces:
PassageReadingInterface, SharedPassage, Heccable, Parseable
Direct Known Subclasses:
EditablePassage, OutputtablePassage
public abstract class AbstractPassage extends Object implements PassageReadingInterface
A class that stores the passage info that is used by OH-HECC and HECC-UP.

      unparsedContent - some unparsed content
      lineEndMetadata - some raw metadata that hasn't been parsed yet.

  • Method Details

    • updatePassageStatus

      void updatePassageStatus()
      This method is used to update the 'status' of this passage. If the passage contents (still) contains a reference to a deleted passage, this is a 'DELETED_LINK' passage. If the passage contains no links to other notes, this passage is an END_NODE otherwise, it's NORMAL.
